bug.author: hagax8
bug.summary: Not all experiments are shown in online dashboard
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
Experiments are not all shown in the polyaxon dashboard. It seems to be a bug with the "Next" button in the view displaying the experiments table. <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
I ran a group of 192 experiments. The online dashboard only shows 6 pages of 20 experiments (so, 120 experiments, missing 72) and then the "Next" button greys out. On the other hand, I can access all experiments from the command line without any problem (9 pages of 20 and 1 page of 12). <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
Have all experiments displayed in the dashboard. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
polyaxon 0.4.4

comments.comment: I think this is fixed in later versions of Polyaxon, definitely fixed in v1. 0.4.4 is very old.
